metadata.title: CVE-2022-46880 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A missing check related to tex units could have led to a use-after-free andpotentially exploitable crash.
*Note*: This advisory was added onDecember 13th, 2022 after we better understood the impact of the issue. Thefix was included in the original release of Firefox 105. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox ESR < 102.6, Firefox < 105, and Thunderbird < 102.6.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
